text: Hippia is a genus of moths of the family Notodontidae described by Möschler in 1878. ==Species== *Hippia mumetes (Cramer, 1775) *Hippia vittipalpis (Walker, [1858]) ==Former species== *Hippia insularis is now Elasmia insularis (Grote, 1866) *Hippia mandela is now Elasmia mandela (Druce, 1887) *Hippia packardii is now Elasmia packardii (Morrison, 1875) ==References== Category:Notodontidae
title: Hippia (moth)
